name: UpdateCustomerGroup
description: Updates a customer group as identified by the `group_id` value.

group_id.description: The ID of the customer group to update.

body.description:
An object containing the fields to POST for the request.

See the corresponding object definition for field details.

$block:
Defines the fields that are included in the response body of
a request to the [UpdateCustomerGroup](https://developer.squareup.com/reference/square_2021-08-18/customer-groups-api/update-customer-group) endpoint.

Either `errors` or `group` is present in a given response (never both).

$ul: **errors**: Any errors that occurred during the request.
**group**: Represents a group of customer profiles.
**created_at**: The timestamp when the customer group was created, in RFC 3339 format.
**id**: A unique Square-generated ID for the customer group.
**name**: The name of the customer group.
**updated_at**: The timestamp when the customer group was last updated, in RFC 3339 format.
